tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_customizations (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    character_skin VARCHAR(50),
    costume VARCHAR(50),
    theme_selection VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE player_preferences (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    character_skin VARCHAR(50),
    costume VARCHAR(50),
    theme_selection VARCHAR(50)
);
